name: Amalga-mates
description:
Made for GeoJam 2022 in ~1.5 days.

Amalga-mates are strange creatures that like to stick together. Different mates have different kinds of abilities. Lead your mates through rooms filled with puzzles.

Controls:

  • R to reset level
  • WASD to move
  • Right click to shoot projectiles
  • F to stop time

Special thanks to Dasnukki who made the musics.
